name: Remnant (Suikyoo)
description:
Grudge and hatred, all in one being granting him immense power. After the darkness within him was cast unto the world, he who was blinded by it felt clarity and saw the truth. Help him fix his mistakes and return the world to its former peace.

This is a submission for the Mini Jam 103 : Darkness

Credits: Music and sound effects from https://www.zapsplat.com

Game Instructions:
W = Move up
A = Move left
S = Move down
D = Move right

Space = Jump

Left Click = Shoot

Info: 

Both the black and white tiles are fighting each other although the white tiles are weaker. That is why you need to help shoot down the black tiles

The attacks of the tiles have a certain pattern or interval to them.

You are immune to the tiles' attacks while in mid-air

MUST-READ-ADDITIONAL-INFO: You can press Esc to skip a cutscene... I'm really sorry for the long-winded dialogues...
